name: DECISE
headerTaglineOne: If you're checking us out, it probably means someone had something wonderful to say about us. ü§©

services.title: Solving the Hardest Problems
services.description: Okay, so we actually call this consulting.  But the truth is, we love solving problems, dreaming big, and seeing the world how it realistically could be--unencumbered by the way it's always been.  We're competitive.  We love challenges. Like legendary American sprinter Michael Johnson once said, ‚ÄúWe're gonna start fast, then we're going to run fast in the middle, then we're gonna end fast.‚Äù

services.title: Software Engineering
services.description: You name the platform and we've written code for it--frontend, backend, and everything between.  We build software from scratch or we lift-out existing code--it doesn't matter to us if the current code is a bowl of spaghetti.  We have won awards for our engineering work and we'd love to show you!

services.title: Data Analytics
services.description: If the data exists, we wrangle it, automate it, pack into your data warehouse, and get you the insights to run your business. We unlock the power of data to drive more meaningful interactions, more experimentation, testing, and optimization.

services.title: Cyber Security & Compliance
services.description: We red team.  We blue team.  No idea what that those words mean?  We work with our clients to conduct audits, automate controls, and provide advisory services on audit, compliance, and cyber security programs.  Did we mention that we love to be challenged?  Most of our work is in highly regulated and complex environments, some of which require secret clearance. Almost all of our work is at incredibly large scale!

services.title: Digital Marketing
services.description: Most marketing experts aren't also IT experts.  That's where we come in.   We help integrate, setup, and run customer engagement strategies across the complex ecosystems that make up "martech."  We setup new systems, clean and migrate customer accounts, build triggers, automations, data pipelines, and execute campaigns so your marketing environment actually works to its full potential.

services.title: Anything Else?
services.description: Lots actually!  We haven't even started to talk about AI or the other IT services we provide.  But we think that's plenty to help you get to know us better.  If you have something on your mind and it has to do with technology, hit us up and let's talk it through! If you're dealing with a sensitive issue, we are happy to sign an NDA before we visit.

aboutpara: We help our customers get the most of out technology! We do things a little differently around here.  We sweat the details.  We take pride in our work and customer service.  White glove service, blue-collar work ethic.

resume.tagline: üëã  I'm a software engineer, product designer.
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Worked on the frontend of a React application, Worked on the frontend of a React application
